name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All drawings are the latest revision; drawing register is complete and matches site documentation
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Project Drawings, Drawing Register
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: ≥400 mm clearance; bedding thickness: 80 mm (clay), 150 mm (rock); bedding material complies with Section 701
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Precast base and riser units match design; knockouts only in required walls; no thinned wall sections
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Fibre content within ±1% of approved mix design
FREQUENCY: Initial design or major change
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Load test per AS 5100; meets vertical load (210 kN), lateral pressure (≥25 kPa), and reinforcement equivalence (≥150 mm²/m)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Openings are saw cut only; epoxy coating on exposed reinforcement; hole diameter within 50 mm of pipe
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Rebated joints ≥15 mm; alignment correct; no horizontal movement
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Installed per AS 1657; positioned to avoid water discharge; epoxy mortared if cast-in
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Class 2 surface finish; joints cleaned, wetted, and mortared; cured ≥48 hours before backfill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Covers bedded on 5 mm mortar; level and kerb line within ±10 mm of design
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Backfill placed in ≤300 mm layers; compacted to refusal using handheld mechanical equipment
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All installation elements conform to drawings and specifications; no defects or non-conformities
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
